hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

locations.GV Crate Freestanding PoH: Small Key Ring (Bottom of the Well)

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that ##Hyrule Field## has #2# major items.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's right and left hands# lie...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# is on the way of the hero.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Deku Stick# and #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nuts (10 pieces)#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Water Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

GC (Maze).text: They say that ##the Water Temple## has #2# major items.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #a Goron Tunic# can be found in #the Market#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Shadow Temple Small Key Ring#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Green Rupee#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that plundering #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is a foolish choice.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that plundering #the Deku Tree# is a foolish choice.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that paying a #fee to the Gerudos# grants access to #the Shadow Temple#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #Kokiri Forest# is on the path to #the Tower#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that a #fractured desert wall# hides a #Great Fairy Fountain#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nuts (10 pieces)#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Wallet#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: I was voted least helpful hint stone five years in a row!

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #a Bow# can be found at #Zora's Domain#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Bombchus (5 pieces)#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #final treasure of Ice Cavern# is #a Compass#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #the Requiem of Spirit#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that plundering #Gerudo's Fortress# is a foolish choice.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Green Rupee#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #the Sacred Forest Meadow# is on the way of the hero.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #the Requiem of Spirit#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Sun's Song#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #collecting cuccos# rewards #a Recovery Heart#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #a Piece of Heart# can be found in #Kokiri Forest#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Sun's Song#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key Ring# can be found in #the Market#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #the Water Temple# is on the way of the hero.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Shadow Temple Small Key Ring#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that racing #Dampé's ghost# rewards...^ #Arrows (5 pieces)# and #a Recovery Heart#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Bombchus (5 pieces)#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #a Strength Upgrade# can be found at #the Desert Colossus#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Wallet#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Kokiri Forest# is on the path of time.
